trans-unit.source: Enumerates the values of <see langword="EmphasisWord" /> for a specific <see langword="TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumera i valori di <see langword="EmphasisWord" /> per un oggetto <see langword="TextFragment" /> specifico.

trans-unit.source: The word emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: L'enfasi word è impostato per <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze tramite il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà in un'istanza di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render emphasis; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
trans-unit.target: Ogni motore di riconoscimento vocale sintetica è gratuito determinare come eseguire il rendering di enfasi; la natura di enfasi differisce tra linguaggi, sottolinguaggi, i sessi o le voci.

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
trans-unit.target: Entrambi <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> possono essere utilizzate durante l'impostazione o il recupero di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> su un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> are greater than or equal to zero, and the values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> are all less than zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance.
trans-unit.target: Possono distinguere i due valori per il fatto che i valori effettivi del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> sono maggiori o uguali a zero e i valori di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> sono tutti minore di zero; e con il valore di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> proprietà di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà in un'istanza.

trans-unit.source: Indicates an engine-specific default level of emphasis.
trans-unit.target: Indica un livello di enfasi predefinito specifico del motore.
